line.comment: * outsourcing the crafting process from Task 0 to be passive now. Always runs on Nomad TLs. On player ships it only runs when loop production is active
* $t = 'crafting ' + $wareToCraft + ' / costs per unit: ' + $cost.1.qty + ' / has ' + $amount + ' units of ' + $resource + ' / allows for ' + $wareToCraft.qty + ' units'
* we cannot craft even just 1 unit and have to wait 10min for more resources
* Nomad TLs craft 8 times faster than player's mobile factories
* Nomad TLs require 45% less resources compared to player

line.text: ' requests more free cargospace! (cannot finish mobile crafting)'

line.comment: * Nomad recyclers just continue to burn all resources away

sval.val: requests more free cargospace! (cannot finish mobile crafting)

$t = 'crafting ' + $wareToCraft + ' / costs per unit: ' + $cost.1.qty + ' / has ' + $amount + ' units of ' + $resource + ' / allows for ' + $wareToCraft.qty + ' units'
